title: Turkey threatens Kurds in Syria, deploys tanks to border
text:
Turkey threatens Kurds in Syria, deploys tanks to border 10:36pm IST - 01:37 
Turkey has deployed tanks on its border with Syria’s Afrin region after threatening to launch an offensive against Kurdish militia forces. Reuters Dominic Evans reports from the Turkey-Syria border.   
Turkey has deployed tanks on its border with Syria’s Afrin region after threatening to launch an offensive against Kurdish militia forces. Reuters Dominic Evans reports from the Turkey-Syria border.  //reut.rs/2B8k369
